name: Christopher Hitchens
description:
There are some topics that always get us in trouble. Christianity, for instance. Every time we poke fun at the goyim and their silly religious traditions, we get a bunch of emails saying how stupid we are. But think about it, goyim. You're the ones eating wafers pretending it's the body of Jesus. Who is stupid now?

But even worse is the topic of anti-Zionism. Here, we can't win, no matter what we write. If we praise an anti-Zionist for something else they've done, we get bashed. And if we deride one for, well, being an anti-Zionist, we get accused of closed-mindedness. So... So:

Christopher Hitchens:

Raised Anglican
Became atheist
Anti-Zionist
Half-Jewish
Now dead

That is all.
